tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StudentsBehavioralData (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(255),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_date DATE,
    behavior_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE behavior_data (
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    behavior_description TEXT,
    observation_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT behavior_data_pk PRIMARY KEY (student_id, observation_date)
);
CREATE TABLE intervention_data (
    intervention_id INT NOT NULL,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    intervention_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    intervention_description TEXT,
    intervention_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT intervention_data_pk PRIMARY KEY (intervention_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
    intervention_description TEXT,
    intervention_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES StudentBehaviorData(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StudentDetails (
  student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  grade_level VARCHAR(10),
  primary_disability VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE BehaviorRecords (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT REFERENCES StudentDetails(student_id),
  behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
  behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  behavior_description TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE InterventionLog (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT REFERENCES StudentDetails(student_id),
  intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
  intervention_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  intervention_details TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE ParentContacts (
  contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT REFERENCES StudentDetails(student_id),
  parent_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_date DATE,
  contact_description TEXT
);
